marklogic.body: Compression is a great addition in so many ways, using it to really make my knackered old squire sing and sustain like a maiden on Heat straight in to my amp and then getting the warmth and solidity out of my valve amp that it really deserve to exude! Â Whack it in my chain after my knockout and listen to it send my pedals into spasmodic Convulsions!!! Pile on the squeeeze raise the some more and punch some serious velcro noise from my now smoking Gain pots! Â Of course rolling back the volume and running it through a nice long delay with a bit of tremelo flutter would be nice, while the compression brings out all the zing you could want, with all peaks and troughs accounted for before boost boost boosting the sound til your shaking the bricks from your house...all that and the best ones you can hardly notice....subtlety is their magic finger...that is if you have one....I dont :(
